description:
- Do you want to create Marketing Videos with professional looking animations?

- Are you looking for simple a solution to record and edit presentations?

- Do you want to create your own Video Courses that you can sell online?

Look no further because you've reached the right place.

My name is Uri Soglowek for the last 15 years I have been producing videos, training materials, working with high end video productions and teaching people how to create high end, audience engaging videos.

My courses: “Make Professional Looking Marketing Videos", “Video Editing using Adobe Premiere Pro", “Professional Video Editing for Internet Marketers", “Effective Project Management With Trello", “ScreenFlow 5 - Create Courses & Edit Videos", “Make iPhone Video Like a Pro" have become bestsellers with 5,000 students.

Keynote is my go to tool when I want to create online courses or when I make a video that will be on my very successful Youtube and Vimeo channels!

The reason I like keynote is because it is easy to use, practical and with it I managed to create online courses and training that is bringing in thousands of dollars in sales.

By the end of this course you will have all the tools you need to create your own training materials and presentations that will do the same for you!

So lets go over what this course has installed for you:

  • We will go over all the Functions,
  • How to create and use slides,
  • How to animate objects,
  • How to trigger your animations with other animations,
  • Creating sophisticated designs with Master slides,
  • Creating your own voice over,
  • Importing music,
  • Creating a video out of your presentation,
  • Demos and breakdowns of the keynote projects I used in my best selling courses
  • and a lot more!

So, if you want to learn how to do all the above and much more, subscribe to the course and I will help you unlock the secrets of Keynote.

i'll see you in the course!
title: Keynote Presentation Unleashed
